title: Privacy Policy
introduction: This privacy policy will always contain the latest details related to all the website features that gather data from your visit.

list: We use Google Analytics, a free service offered by Google that gathers information from your visit. The data Google gather’s doesn’t enable us to know your name, sex, telephone number, email or any other personal detail that identifies you. Some of the data Google tracks include—

We track data to ensure our website provides an enjoyable, comfortable, and useful experience for you. Our goal is to design an experience that provides the information you’re looking for and that it’s accessible through most devices and browsers.
If you’d like to prevent Google Analytics from tracking your visit, visit this website, where Google offers a downloadable widget that blocks Google Analytics on any website you visit.
If you have any questions or concerns about this policy, or would like to know a bit more about our website send us an email at matvallejo@outlook.com.
